name: Chances
description:
Chances is single and multiplayer game of chances. It is played with two dices, the result of each dice represent a column and a row of the equivalent number.

The goal of the game is to connect dots for one side to the other, the dots have to connect to each other without necessarily be in a straight line. The way to choose a dot is by throwing a dice for example if the result of the dice is 1 and 1 you will mark the box that is represented by the numbers 1-1. The game has 18 turns, in each turn you throw the dices, you can only place 8 marks out of the turns so you have to be careful on where you put your marks.
